column2: I would not rate this place so poorly because the food is actually good as is the service an ambience. Unfortunately their corporate policy of having no reservations is frustrating because it makes it so that it is impossible to break fast on time. Despite attempting multiple avenues before hand to secure a spot simply so we would be able to break our fasts on time we were still denies based off of this corporate policy. I know this review will not change anything but I needed it to be said
